permissions: Admin users can list all work orders. Operations members with manager business unit membership can list work orders for their business units; manager members of a broker can list all work orders for their brokers. General business unit members can list work orders only when they have assigned maintenance requirements on the work order. Technician business unit members can list work orders they are assigned to or that have assigned maintenance requirements for them. Operations members (non-manager) can list work orders for their business units and child business units.
validation_notes: priority must be one of: urgent, high, normal, low. status must be one of: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, on_hold, completed. safety-tag-status must be one of: red, yellow. due-date-min and due-date-max must be YYYY-MM-DD dates.

flags.name: --responsible-party
flags.description: Filter by responsible party (business unit) ID

flags.name: --custom-work-order-status
flags.description: Filter by custom work order status ID

flags.name: --priority
flags.validation: One of: urgent, high, normal, low.

flags.name: --status
flags.validation: One of: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, on_hold, completed.
